title: iPhone 15 Pro Max
description: The iPhone 15 Pro Max features a titanium body, A17 Pro chip, and an improved camera system with a 5x telephoto lens.

title: iPhone 14
description: The iPhone 14 offers solid performance with the A15 Bionic chip, dual-camera system, and improved battery life.

title: iPhone SE (3rd generation)
description: A compact and affordable iPhone with the powerful A15 Bionic chip, Touch ID, and 5G capabilities.

title: Google Pixel 8 Pro
description: The Pixel 8 Pro features the Google Tensor G3 chip, advanced AI-powered photography, and a vivid OLED display.

title: Google Pixel 7a
description: An affordable Pixel phone with Tensor G2 chip, wireless charging, and great camera features at a mid-range price.
